content: just ducky cuddle quilt designed by c l halvorson & the happy house ladies abbreviations beg - beginning chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch space - space double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet blo - back loop only note this afghan is worked using worsted weight yarn in the colors specified with each project it is made up of two different types of granny squares a solid color granny and a bi-color granny general directions for each are as follows below simply crochet the number of squares needed for each block in the color required then assemble as described in instructions solid color granny finished square measures approximately 2 1/2 chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 three times join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 2 chain 3 turn 2 double_crochet in first chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in same chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 in remaining 3 chain 1 sps join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 finish off weave in loose ends bi-color granny finished square measures approximately 2 1/2 chain 4 with main color join with a slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring drop main color but do not cut pickup second color yo draw through loop on hook 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 2 turn slip_stitch in first chain 1 space chain 3 2 double_crochet in same chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space drop second color pick up main color again yo draw through loop on hook 3 double_crochet in same chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in last chain 1 space chain 1 join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 finish off weave in loose ends eye granny finished square measures approximately 2 1/2 with black chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 three times join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 change to yellow round 2 chain 3 turn 2 double_crochet in first chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in same chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in remaining 3 chain 1 sps chain 1 join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 finish off weave in loose ends just ducky cuddle quilt materials needed size g crochet hook tapestry needle 20 oz turqua worsted weight yarn
